sourceDesc.p: Transcription reprinted by Ian St George in eColenso May 2015 Supplement, available at http://www.colensostudy.id.au/Newsletters/eCol%205%20May15%20supplement.pdf
Encoded into TEI by Jamie Norrish, 17.11.15

body.p: Knowing your anxiety about your boy Latimer I write to say that I duly delivered your parcel and that I have seen him frequently since, he is at one of the best places in Auckland the Revd. Mr. Kingdomâ€™s and bears a good character. Any message he may have for you I will take down on my return.
